id: api/Social Login - OAuth2/Send Request for Social login
title: Send Request for Social login
description: To initiate a social login request, construct the authorization URL using the base API URL, OAuth2 provider, and redirect URI. This URL will direct the user to the OAuth2 provider's authorization page.
